title: TYPEFACE SUGGESTION?
content:
Hello, Need to find a typeface as close to  
Helvetica Neue – 97 Black Condensed (see attatched),  
but a distressed version. Anyone have any suggestions?

Ones I am finding look a little tacky and cheap.

Need to be bold and be as close to 97 Black Condensed as possible

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012070334im_/http:/typophile.com/files/TYPEFACE_3424.jpg)

Thanks in advance

Chris

 [‹ Bloomingdales 'Liitle brown bag'](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012070334/http:/typophile.com/node/50342 "Go to previous forum topic") [identity this font plz ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012070334/http:/typophile.com/node/50264 "Go to next forum topic")
author: chris.peters

comments.content:
there are quite a few tutorials on how to distress type in photoshop if you’re interested.  
if you do chose that path, remember that the image has to be correct in ps, once the file is created you shouldn’t scale it.
